de.japi.components.layout

Class Japi2FixLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.japi.components.layout.Japi2FixLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager

    public class Japi2FixLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager
    A simple layout to lay-out components at a fixed position. This class is adapted from the class JAPI_FixLayout in the original JAPI kernel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Japi2FixLayout()
      Constructs an empty layout and sets the vertical and horizontal gap to 5 pixel.
